seo.title: Angular Developer Roadmap: Learn to become a Angular developer
seo.description: Community driven, articles, resources, guides, interview questions, quizzes for angular development. Learn to become a modern Angular developer by following the steps, skills, resources and guides listed in this roadmap.

title: Angular Developer
